categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: This is a list of all official Star Wars media. This includes all official films, television series, short films, novels, junior novels, young-readers books, short stories, comics, video games, magazines, newsletters, reference books, roleplaying rulebooks, sourcebooks, board games, theme park attractions, making-of content, and more.

Out-of-universe, internet-exclusive media, such as non-fiction StarWars.com articles, are not included in this list. Fan fiction, fanzines, and other unofficial media are also not included. Only media containing at least some original material are included. (For example, no reprints.) Individual installments originally released in one collection are not individually listed; only the collection is listed. (For example, short stories released only in a collection are not listed, while short stories first released individually are listed even if they are later included in a collection.)

Media are listed by release date. For media listed by in-universe chronology, see the timeline of canon media and the timeline of Legends media. Media without an intended chronological placement, such as reference books or certain video games, will not be found in such timelines, but are found in this list.
Dates provided are known times of last intended release unless otherwise stated.
